channel.title: Run Error
channel.description:
when i go to run my project exiled source this is the error i get in the cmd, any1 know how to fix? Loaded clipmap in 2324ms. [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: Launching Project-Exile... [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: java.io.IOExcep tion: Unable to establish loopback connection [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Sour ce) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno wn Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:156) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: Caused by: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested ad dress: bind [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [5/11/12 4:45 PM]: ... 12 more

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

when i go to run my project exiled source this is the error i get in the cmd, any1 know how to fix?
